00011 class export2CSV{
00012     
00013     var $delimiter = ",";
00014     var $row_end = "\n";
00015     
00016     function exportDb2CSV($delimiter,$row_end){
00017         $this->delimiter = $delimiter;
00018         $this->row_end = $row_end;
00019     }
00020     
00021     function create_csv_file_header($data)
00022     {
00023         $row = "";
00024         if (count($data)>0){
00025             foreach ($data[0] as $key=>$val)
00026             {
00027                 if ($row){
00028                     $row .= $this->delimiter . $key;
00029                 }else{
00030                     $row .= $key;
00031                 }
00032             }
00033             $row .= $this->row_end;
00034         }
00035         return $row;
00036     }
00037     
00038     
00039     function create_csv_file_row($row)
00040     {
00041         $res = "";
00042         foreach ($row as $key=>$val)
00043         {
00044             if ($res){
00045                 $res .= $this->delimiter .'"'. $val.'"';
00046             }else{
00047                 $res .= '"'.$val.'"';
00048             }
00049         }
00050         $res .= $this->row_end;
00051     
00052         return $res;
00053     }
00054     
00055     function create_csv_file($data)
00056     {
00057         $csv = $this->create_csv_file_header($data);
00058         foreach ($data as $key=>$val){
00059             $csv .= $this->create_csv_file_row($val);
00060         }
00061         return $csv;
00062     }
00063 }
